fields.label: Chores
fields.options:
1. Read log book, comm. book and initial
2. Tidy the office
3. Wash dishes
4. Wipe appliances
5. Wipe out microwave
6. Wipe remote controls
7. Ensure glove supply is full
8. Help client throughout the shift
9. Complete all necessary paperwork
10. Check and remove snow
11. Hand in keys and shift binder
